detaileddescription.para:
Calculates the loss length E dx/dE in [m]. This is not used in the simulation.
id
PDG particle id
gamma
Lorentz factor of particle
z
redshift

memberdef.argsstring: (bool onProton, double Ein, double eps) const
memberdef.name: sophiaEvent

detaileddescription.para:
Direct SOPHIA interface. Output is an object SophiaEventOutput with two vectors "energy" and "id" each of length N (number of out-going particles). The i-th component of each vector corresponds to the same particle. This is not used in the simulation.
onProton
proton or neutron
Ein
energy of nucleon
eps
energy of target photon

memberdef.argsstring: (bool onProton, double E, double z) const
memberdef.name: sampleEps

detaileddescription.para:
SOPHIA's photon sampling method. Returns energy [J] of a photon of the photon field.
onProton
particle type: proton or neutron
E
energy of incoming nucleon [J]
z
redshift of incoming nucleon

detaileddescription.para:
called by: sampleEps
onProton
particle type: proton or neutron
Ein
energy of incoming nucleon
z

epsMax

output: maximum probability of all photons in field
